resources.string:
<sprite=0><indent=4em>All characters are available to play in training mode</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=4em>XP is earned through playing quick matches. <#5BB9F4>Reach level 2</color> and you'll <#5BB9F4>unlock a character of your choice</color>!</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=4em>Please leave us feedback through the link on the main menu</indent>
It's time to unlock a character!

Head over to the gallery and use your token to unlock any character you want. Be sure to try the characters out in training mode if you haven't already.
You will earn your next <#5BB9F4>character token</color> at <#5BB9F4>level 15</color>.
Have fun in the arena!

As before, choose wisely and be sure to try the character out in training mode before locking in your purchase.
Keep playing and more characters will unlock as you gain levels. You are <#5BB9F4>guaranteed a new character every 30 levels</color>, with luck you'll get them earlier. New characters will arrive every few months, be on the lookout.
Let us know how we're doing and have fun in the arena!
*Icons will always match you against players of similar skill, regardless of setting.

<sprite=0><indent=4em>Customize your 1v1 experience by displaying your skill rating.</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=4em>Ranked matches will show your skill rating at the end of a match.</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=4em>Friendly matches are what you've been playing, no rating is shown.</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=4em>You may switch modes at any point in the video settings menu.</indent>

<sprite=0><indent=4em>This is not a fully featured ranked mode.</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=4em>You will be playing the same opponents, in the same 1v1 queue.</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=4em>We are collecting data on how ratings affect your experience in preparation for building our ranked system.</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=4em>Let us know what Ranked means to you and good luck in the queue!</indent>
LOG IN AND EARN FREE STUFF
Receive these rewards for logging in on the following days
Receive these rewards for logging in on the following days
Receive these rewards for logging in on the following days
You must have an online connection to play 1v1.
You must have baked animations to play 1v1.
You must have an online connection to create a custom lobby.
You must have an online connection to join a custom lobby.
KEYBOARD / MOUSE REQUIRED TO LOG IN
I am over 13 and have read and agreed to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Username must be at least #* characters long.
Username may only contains letters and numbers.
Password must contain at least one capital letter.
Password must contain a special character.
Password must contain at least one number.
Password must be at least #* characters long.
Check your network connection and try again. If the problem persists, please try again later.
Connecting to the game servers failed with error code #*. Please try again!
Servers Offline. Please visit our Discord community for more information.
Error 2007 Servers Offline. Please visit our Discord community for more information.

Please update your client to continue.
If no update is available, select "Verify integrity of local files" from the properties menu to force an update.
You must enter a longer name.
That name is not allowed, please enter a different one.
That email address is already in use, please enter a different one.
The address you provided is not a valid email, please check for any errors and try again.
Oops! The client has experienced an error. If it continues, please let us know.
You're ready to join the fight!
Are you sure you want to leave the lobby?
Either there is currently no room using the name #* or the password that you provided is incorrect.
No more players can currently join the room.
A room has already been created using the name #*. Try a different name.
You are already in a lobby. Please restart your client to join a new lobby.
You are already in a match. Please restart your client to join a new match.
Unable to join. The lobby is currently running a match.
Steam error. Failed to create a lobby. Try logging in to steam again.
System error. Please restart the game to join a new match.
The room has been destroyed because the owner left.
The best way for us to improve the game is to listen to your feedback. Tell us about bugs, give suggestions, or just leave a comment.
Your message has been sent, thank you!
There was an error sending your feedback. If this problem persists please let us know!
Unable to join because the match has already started.
Steam has encountered and error joining the match
Thank you for your patience. An error forced the game to exit. Please test if you can repeat the error if it is not connection related.
Names may only contain letters, numbers and spaces.
Names must be at least #* letters long.
Something went wrong with saving your data. Please try again!
You must keep at least one options profile.
You cannot leave while locked in
Thank you for your patience. An error forced the game to exit. Please test if you can repeat the error if it is not connection related.
A player was disconnected during the match.
You were queued into a match while already in one.
You were kicked because a character wasn't selected
This lobby is on a different Beta Code. Check #Getting-Started on Discord to access the same Beta Code.
There was a failure in the queue. Try again in a few minutes.
There was a failure which caused the match to end.
Failed to establish a UDP connection. Check your connection and firewall settings. If the problem persists, read our FAQ on discord or contact customer service for support
Not all players are on the character select screen.
Failed to add player to the room
All players must return to the lobby screen before starting the match.
The matchmaking servers are currently offline. Please try again in a few minutes!
There was a problem joining the matchmaking queue. Please try again!
Cannot join the lobby as your are currently in a lobby
Are you sure you want to delete this rule set?
You cannot have more than #* rule sets.
Are you sure you want to quit the current matchmaking queue?
Buy character with Currency or Spectra:
Unlock all current and future characters
Try before you buy! #* is available in training mode.
Are you sure you want to unlock <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%> for <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%>? You have #* remaining.
Are you sure you want to unlock <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%> for <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%><sprite=0> ?

YOU DO NOT OWN <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%> are you sure you want to unlock <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%> for <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%><sprite=0> ?
Thank you for your support, see you in the arena.
Included: PRO ACCOUNT (Unlock all current and future characters), 5 Portal Packs, Ashani Wavedash Skin & Beta Player Icon
Unlock all current and future characters
Are you sure you want to unlock <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%> for <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%> <sprite=0> ?
You must unlock this character to proceed. Unlock <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%> for <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</><size=100%>?
Pro Account, 5 Portal Packs, Ashani Wavedash Skin, Beta Player Icon
By clicking Continue you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
There was a problem. Please try again!
You can earn more Spectra from Portal Packs!
Your Spectra count has become desynchronized from the server. You have been returned to the main menu.
Something went wrong and your client is out of sync. You will be returned to the login page.
An unknown error occurred. Please try again!
You have been unexpectedly logged out of the game.
Seems that the store has been updated. Please re-enter the store and try again!
You cannot make a purchase because the Steam overlay cannot be raised. Please enable the overlay in your Steam settings.
There was a problem. Please try again!
New #* added to your collection <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%> !
Unlock all current and future characters for only <size=110%><font="LeagueSpartan-Bold SDF">#*</font><size=100%>
We've disabled model rotation in the gallery due to continuous detection of right stick inputs. This may be the result of a faulty vjoy driver. Visit our FAQ for more info.
Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default?
Do you want to save unsaved controls settings?
Are you sure you want to leave? Your controls settings cannot be saved since movement is unbound.
Are you sure you want to leave the match? Leaving the match will also cause you to destroy the lobby
Are you sure you want to leave the match? Leaving the match will also cause you to leave the lobby
Are you sure you want to leave the match?
